Player History
Released by Milwaukee on 5/1/2005...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/2006 to a minor league deal...
Released by Los Angeles on 5/9/2007...
Drafted in 7th round, 188th overall pick, by Toronto in 2009...
Injured on 7/5/2010 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...
Released by Toronto on 3/2/2012...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 8/23/2012 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Boston to Colorado on 4/24/2013 (Going to COL: SS R. Furcal, 3B J. Prince. Going to BOS: P E. Scribner)...
Traded from Colorado to Arizona on 4/1/2015 (Going to ARI: CF J. Prince. Going to COL: 3B J. Leininger)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Mike Nannini (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2015, off Kevin Martinez (LA)...
Injured on 4/27/2015 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...

Injured on 4/7/1978 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/13/1984 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/18/1984 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Injured on 8/8/1984 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...

Hit first career homerun on 4/3/1985, off Tom Hume (ATL)...
